translation.login.passerrorTitle: Password is incorrect. Please try again!
translation.DeleteAccountFirstText1: Are you sure, you want to proceed?
translation.DeleteAccountFirstText2: By deleting your account you will lose access to all your previous order history and will miss out the last offers, promotions and flash sales.
translation.DeleteAccountText1: We are sorry to see you go
translation.DeleteAccountText2: By deleting your account you will lose access to all your previous order history and will miss out the last offers, promotions and flash sales.
translation.DeleteAccountPasswordText1: Enter your password to delete this account
translation.DeleteAccountCompleteText1: Your account has been permanently deleted from our system. All of your personal information, order history, and payment details have been removed and cannot be recovered.
translation.DeleteAccountCompleteText2: If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.
translation.DeleteAccountCompleteText3: Thank you for using our app!
translation.header.Title: Best Sellers
translation.restartApp: You have to restart the app
translation.logOut: Are you sure you want to logout?
translation.cart.removeAllItemsDescription: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your cart?
translation.errorInRemoveFromWishList: We can't remove product from wishList at current moment
translation.errorInRemoveFromCart: We can't remove item from Cart at current moment
translation.errorInAddToWishList: We can't add product to wishList at current moment
translation.removeItemDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
translation.cartEmptyDesc1: Uh-oh, it looks like your cart is empty! Don’t miss out on our amazing deals at skysalesonline.com.
translation.cartEmptyDesc2: Browse our wide selection of products, from trendy fashion to cutting-edge gadgets, and add your favorites to your cart to start saving today. Happy shopping!
translation.errorAddingToCart: Error! on item added to cart
